title: Tyler Hoover of Hoovie's Garage & AutoTrader
description:
This podcast is about bad cars, weird cars, and LS-swapped 911s. Our guest is Tyler Hoover, an automotive journalist who has made a name for himself by acquiring a vast collection of...odd cars, or "hoopties", as he calls them. He's a man with eccentric taste, truly adhering to the idea, "Variety is the spice of life." 

 

 

This show is available as a video!

https://youtu.be/iAcWPGh8KO8

You can find videos of all of Tyler's cars (including his LS-swapped 911) on his YouTube channel, "Hoovie's Garage". 
https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCdEczn3MVkx_4PnMZ10MVFA


He also writes for AutoTrader.com/Oversteer, alongside Doug Demuro (and others).
https://www.autotrader.com/oversteer

Follow him on Twitter here: 
http://www.twitter.com/hooviesgarage
author: matt@thesmokingtire.com (Matt Farah & Zack Klapman)
